entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023
